This vignette demonstrates how to use **linregPkg** to fit linear regression
models and inspect the results.

Authors: Aset Zhumatai, Pranjal Saha Arnab

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(linregPkg)


data(iris)
mod <- linreg_fit(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Width + Sepal.Length, data = iris)
```
## Print
```{r}
mod$print()
```

## Plot
```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=10}
mod$plot()
```

## Coefficients 
```{r}
mod$coef()
```
## Residuals
```{r}
head(mod$resid())
```
## Predictions
```{r}
head(mod$pred())
```
## Summary
```{r}
mod$summary()
```
